item.description:
Hello Boston!

We are proud to present to you the king of Gujarati comedy, one and only Dinkar Mehta. If you are Gujarati or understand little bit of Gujarati, this show is a must see. It is going to be a fun evening where Dinkar Mehta will entertain people of all ages. As they say laughter is the best medicine so please come with your family and kids and have a ball.

In addition to the 2 hour comedy show the evening will feature the following:
• Comedy King Dinkar Mehta
• Live performances and music
• Cash Buffet/Snacks from Dosa Temple
• Cash Bar
• Fashion & Jewelry
• And much more.

The event will be held at the spacious Elks lodge in Lowell (40 Old Ferry Road Lowell, MA 01854). There is plenty of parking available.

Please contact us if you want to volunteer, participate or sponsor.

Sourav: 585-733-3490    Jigar: 617:852- 8733

Mirza: 508-826-5559       Nadim: 857-294-5956

Tickets:

Adult : $20
Kid (Age 5-12): $10

https://mycity.sulekha.com/family-comedy-show-dinkar-mehta_buy_611464

See you all on August 26th.
item.name: Family Comedy Show
